Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only embodies quality but also holds a unique value that aligns with its price point. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $18000. This price reflects the true worth of the product and includes all its exceptional qualities. I believe this investment will be highly beneficial for you, given its capabilities and the value it can add to your needs. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
